I didn't get a chance to look since it isn't there
anymore, but the easy way to tell if if Toshiro Mifune
pops out of nowhere or it says directed by Okamoto. :)
Either way, don't worry because you are going to get
it soon whether you like it or not anyways. ;)

Wierd how these coincidences happen if it is. 

Kevin

--- spiritus saitou <spiritus_saitou@...> wrote:
> I'm not going to pitch it quite *that* quickly.  For
> all I know (which isn't much) it may be the same and
> it was produced in Korea or something.  I just found
> it curious and thought maybe you knew more about it.
>  Maybe Kevin knows something, so I'll wait to see if
> he knows anything.  Even if it's not the same film,
> it's worth taking a look at for it's own sake.  I'm
> fond of Korean cinema as well.  And thanks for
> making these things available to us.  I, for one,
> truly appreciate the opportunity to see things I
> might not otherwise get a chance to see...
> Shinsengumi related or not.  (And I'll love you
> forever for the RK manga scanlation!  I'm in Saitou
> and Sano heaven!)
>  
> phil
